title: MVL is Out of The Candidates Tournament 2018
description:
#agadmator The World Chess Championship 2018 is an upcoming chess match between the reigning World Chess Champion, Magnus Carlsen, and a challenger to determine the World Chess Champion. It will be held under the auspices of FIDE, the world chess federation, with the organisation rights belonging to Agon, its commercial partner.

The 12-game match is planned to take place in the last quarter of 2018.

The challenger will be the winner of a double round-robin Candidates Tournament with eight players, which will be played in Berlin, Germany, on March 10â€“28, 2018.

Anish Giri vs Maxime Vachier-Lagrave
Norway Chess (2016), Stavanger NOR, rd 2, Apr-20 
Sicilian Defense: Najdorf Variation (B96)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. Bg5 e6 7. f4 h6 8. Bh4 Qb6 9. a3 Be7 10. Bf2 Qc7 11. Qf3 Nbd7 12. O-O-O b5 13. g4 g5 14. h4 gf4 15. Be2 Rg8 16. Rdg1 d5 17. ed5 Ne5 18. Qh3 ed5 19. Re1 Kf8 20. Nf5 Bf5 21. gf5 Bc5 22. Qf1 d4 23. Nb1 Ne4 24. Bf3 Nf2 25. Ba8 Ned3 26. Kd2 Ne1 27. Qf2 d3 28. Qe1 Be3
